Sentencas: In the present work, Sr-doped lanthanum manganite is successfully synthesized using sol-gel route.
Titulo: Nanoparticles size effect on transport properties of doped manganite elaborated by sol-gel route

Sentencas: Obtained compounds are annealed at 600 and 800 degrees C in the aim to modify the nanoparticles size.
Titulo: Nanoparticles size effect on transport properties of doped manganite elaborated by sol-gel route

Sentencas: Structural, morphological, and electrical properties are characterized by X-ray diffraction, transmission electron microscopy, and impedance spectroscopy technique, respectively.
Titulo: Nanoparticles size effect on transport properties of doped manganite elaborated by sol-gel route

Sentencas: For both samples, a metal-semiconductor transition is observed.
Titulo: Nanoparticles size effect on transport properties of doped manganite elaborated by sol-gel route

Sentencas: It is noticed that the particle size increase leads to an increase in the transition temperature.
Titulo: Nanoparticles size effect on transport properties of doped manganite elaborated by sol-gel route

Sentencas: According to the conductivity spectra, the dispersive frequency region reveals the coexistence of hopping and tunneling process models.
Titulo: Nanoparticles size effect on transport properties of doped manganite elaborated by sol-gel route

Sentencas: The frequency dependence of the disorder and the hopping energies explains the charge carriers dynamics.
Titulo: Nanoparticles size effect on transport properties of doped manganite elaborated by sol-gel route

Sentencas: A close resemblance between the calculated activation energies coming from the hopping frequency and the relaxation time is observed.
Titulo: Nanoparticles size effect on transport properties of doped manganite elaborated by sol-gel route

Sentencas: This resemblance establishes that the conduction and the relaxation processes are attributed to the same origin.
Titulo: Nanoparticles size effect on transport properties of doped manganite elaborated by sol-gel route

Sentencas: Besides, the scaling representation discloses the validity of the time-temperature superposition principle presenting the universality of the conductivity response.
Titulo: Nanoparticles size effect on transport properties of doped manganite elaborated by sol-gel route

Sentencas: The temperature and the frequency dependence of the conduction mechanism are confirmed by the Summerfield scaling model.
Titulo: Nanoparticles size effect on transport properties of doped manganite elaborated by sol-gel route

Sentencas: Such interesting phenomena are determined for the bigger nanoparticles system.
Titulo: Nanoparticles size effect on transport properties of doped manganite elaborated by sol-gel route

Sentencas: In fact, the particle size increase provokes the increase in the electrical conductivity which is confirmed by the activation energy decrease.
Titulo: Nanoparticles size effect on transport properties of doped manganite elaborated by sol-gel route

Sentencas: This result is investigated in terms of core-shell model.
Titulo: Nanoparticles size effect on transport properties of doped manganite elaborated by sol-gel route

Sentencas: Therefore, the particle growth allows improving the performance of the Solid Oxide Fuel Cells using the mixed-valence Sr-doped lanthanum manganite as an electrode.
Titulo: Nanoparticles size effect on transport properties of doped manganite elaborated by sol-gel route
